GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v6.0.13
GSD.description:
tipc: call tipc_lxc_xmit without holding node_read_lock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit 1bb4f8be3797a1c12c1708253ca5535cff9afa9c, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit f73b12812a3d1d798b7517547ccdcf864844d2cd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tipc: call tipc_lxc_xmit without holding node_read_lock
OSV.details:
tipc: call tipc_lxc_xmit without holding node_read_lock
